name: Word Pop Shuffle
description:
Word Pop Shuffle is a fun and challenging word game which will challenge your spelling skills!

With over a thousand words to solve Word Pop Shuffle will keep you challenged for a long time.

Increase in level to increase the difficulty. Reach challenging goals to complete levels.

Features
- Over a thousand words to solve
- 10 difficulty levels
- 3 boosters to help along the way
- Easy and intuitive to play
